overview: 'Compulsive Viewing: The Films Of Guy Bourdin' showcases eleven unique fashion films, edited in 2002-2003 from never-before-seen, archival film recorded by the photographer Guy Bourdin. Exposing and exploring Bourdin's grasp of the moving image, this legacy of cinefilms is a stellar example of how a photographer's aesthetic can translates to fashion film.
title: Compulsive Viewing - Silk Girl
